conversation.message: Hello Company_C team—I'm Seeker_E and I’m very interested in joining Company_C as my top choice. I’m ready to move quickly through your process and can start promptly. After reviewing current needs and our hiring priorities for this opening, we won’t be moving forward with your application at this time. In round 1, only Seeker_E applied to us; accepting now would fill our single quota and prevent us from matching with higher-priority candidates who may approach us in subsequent rounds. Given market preferences, Seeker_B and Seeker_C rank Company_C 3rd/2nd respectively and may come to us if they don’t secure Company_A/Company_B; Seeker_D ranks us 2nd and may also approach. Therefore, it’s optimal to reject Seeker_E now to preserve the slot for a higher-priority seeker, despite the risk of ending unmatched.
